Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: The project isn't dead for sure, it has another channels where the updates are posted. Currently, bitcointalk isn't in the list. The best way to follow the updates is either FB, Medium or Telegram. You can also check our VK, Twitter, Discord, Instagram and YouTube.  As for the latest updates:  FLUX has been listed on 2 exchanges: 1. Coinplace.pro 2. BEEX  We are going to have AMA in approximately 2 weeks.  IDEX will have FLUX listed in about the same time, however, this is subject to change.  In a week a full scope marketing campaign will be launched.  In a few days a big client update will be posted.  And lastly, but not finally, we are going to connect product transactions with exchange API on May so we will receive some volume.  Thank you for choosing FLUX as your gaming platform, and stay tuned for more!

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: The FLUX team decided to shift priorities, and stop distracting to tasks such as sending tokens urgently (we by no means mean that we will not do this, everyone will receive their tokens BEFORE listing our coin). In this case, we'd like to note that absolutely all tokens for our depositors have already been paid. Bonus tokens are sent, 1/3 of the airdrop is sent, only a pool of bounty and the rest of the airdrop and referral tokens are left.

Author: storfox
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: What are the advantages of your decentralized gaming platform from other similar gaming projects working on the blockchain? Do game developers get a reward for placing their games on your platform?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Here are the advantages for the developers that FLUX offers: easy registration process for opening accounts; - quick verification of games; - revenue from each game session; - 0% commission for each game transaction for competitive games; - 2% commission for each game transaction for non-competitive games; - continuous support from the FLUX team; - rapid audience growth due to tournaments organized by the FLUX team.  As for our pros compared to other projects, we hope this little extract will be a good answer for you!  FLUX is the first solution in the eSports market that provides decentralized interaction between gamers, viewers and the platform itself.   While some platforms offer their users one or two specific features only (e.g, GilGam or EtherSports), FLUX is an ecosystem that provides multi-level interactivity of the game process. Moreover, FLUX gives players numerous new channels to monetize cybersports achievements, unavailable on existing platforms.   Items economy If you want to enhance your gaming experience, you can use FLUX’s advanced and secure Trading Platform that enables community members to trade items from different games using FLUX COINS. FirstBlood members do not have such an opportunity.   Streaming monetization Live Streaming is one of the key features of FLUX. We offer a versatile system (both mobile and desktop) that will enable players profiting from winning competitive matches and tournaments, trading in-game objects, and conducting gameplay broadcasts.   Transparency and fairness FLUX is secure and easy to use. Smart contracts ensure fair and transparent transactions within the platform. Thanks to our recent partnership with MoxyOne, participants can now use credit or debit cards for transparent and convenient transactions.   One of a kind crowdfunding platform! Game developers can use FLUX crowdfunding platform to upload their games to the Developer Market and verify them. If a developer has raised funds to create their game using FLUX crowdfunding platform, part of the income is distributed among contributors as well.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX is one of the few fully accredited ICOs which accepts fiat currency. The processing of fiat payments takes from 2 to 10 days. Given the volatility of the cryptocurrency in general, this is quite a long term. So the core of the issue is that the calculator in your personal account reflects changes on the cryptomarket constantly, but that doesn't synchronize with the fiat processing.

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: We believe that FLUX's concept of very different services integrated into one ecosystem requires individual approach towards each one; that's where microservices structure comes in. Compartmentalization of the general system into clear, well-defined modules managed by separate teams is what will let us manage the system of this complexity.

The peculiarity of the platform is that you can immediately stream to various streaming services, because Twitch, YouTube and so on.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX is secure and easy to use. Smart contracts ensure fair and transparent transactions within the platform. Thanks to our recent partnership with MoxyOne, participants can now use credit or debit cards for transparent and convenient transactions. There's a variety of ways we can protect the integrity of the platform. If it’s a question of existing technical solutions (for example, trading items from Steam), then we are going to use the best practices already implemented by Steam, like automatic purchase after Steam's approval, making it impossible to cheat. In case of small vendors a reconciliation of assets databases will be conducted.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: The Flux ecosystem will have its own trading platform where every participant can trade items that are available in the Flux Store. Each purchase will be processed immediately by Flux and the product or service will be credited to the gamer's account instantly. Virtual assets that could be traded in Flux: ● in-game items; ● digital skins; ● in-game currencies; ● digital game packages; ● and more. There are no commissions for trading virtual goods for other virtual goods in Flux. There is, however, a 2% commission for buying and selling virtual goods.

Author: superwallet
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: How will a trading platform and a store work on flux?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: As we said earlier, FLUX ecosystem will have its own trading platform where every participant can trade items that are available in the Flux Store. Each purchase will be processed immediately by Flux and the product or service will be credited to the gamer's account instantly.  There are no commissions for trading virtual goods for other virtual goods in FLUX. There is, however, a 2% commission for buying and selling virtual goods. The FLUX Store commissions are described in the terms of the Developer Market. Advantages for gamers and traders: ● possibility to buy and sell skins and other in-game items using Flux tokens; ● possibility to trade skins and other in-game items using Flux tokens. As a further advantage, gamers will have the opportunity to create custom skins in the Steam workshop and use a FLUX gamer vote for accepting that certain skin. In case of acceptance, 20% of sales go to voters, 60% go to the skin creator, and 20% goes to FLUX.

Author: spottcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Are you sure that Flux will not charge a commission? How will they earn money then?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: These are the commissions FLUX platform will charge: 1. FLUX Market is a marketplace for developers which is geared towards the monetization of competitive games. FLUX takes 0% commission for downloads or in-game purchases made via mobile applications for such types of games. 2. FLUX's matchmaking system usually takes a 1% to 7% commission on each bet placed by a gamer. It is distributed among FLUX to cover platform’s needs (10% of commission amount for SaaS, 15% for Marketing, 10% for Operations and Support, 10% for rewards and referral system payouts, 5% are saved as platform’s savings) and up to 50 % for Game Owner (Developer). 3. There is no commission for Virtual Goods (VG) VG to VG trading in FLUX. However, FLUX takes commission for VG buy/sell process between users in amount of 2%. 4. It will be possible to create skins in Steam workshop and by using a FLUX audience vote for accepting a certain skin. In case of acceptance, 20% of sales split between voters, 60% go to skin author, 20% go to FLUX.

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: This is not quite true. Currently we are thinking on the topic of the token sale's conditions optimization now, so the new updates are coming. Tomorrow there will be an announcement. Stay tuned!  Quote from: lilaj4de on April 12, 2018, 07:37:14 PM Is this soft cap e for the pre sale or for the project to start? Will the unsold tokens be burned? These game vendors, are they partners or will the project get in touch so can use they Flux platform?  1) The soft cap designates a minimum amount of funds to jumpstart the project. 2) We will burn the unsold tokens. 3) As to the question of game vendors. legally and technically speaking, currently our platform deals with the API of the distributor like Steam. Depending on the game, the negotiations of various nature could be held and direct partnerships established. Follow our announcements!

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Greetings! Introducing another payment method to a blockchain-based platform designed to be a unifying ecosystem would beat the purpose of the project. A simple, transparent and unified payment method is integral to the idea of the project. Strengthening FLUX token will allow us to implement our solutions to the problems that we keep seeing in the market. So while cooperation with similar projects is very much our goal, the core of FLUX will exist in its current form, and that means our token will be left as a sole payment method inside the platform. Hope that clarifies our stance!

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX is an unique project!  FLUX is the first solution in the eSports market that provides decentralized interaction between gamers, viewers and the platform itself.  While some platforms offer their users one or two specific features only (e.g, GilGam or EtherSports), FLUX is an ecosystem that provides multi-level interactivity of the game process. Moreover, FLUX gives players numerous new channels to monetize cybersports achievements, unavailable on existing platforms.  Items economy If you want to enhance your gaming experience, you can use FLUX’s advanced and secure Trading Platform that enables community members to trade items from different games using FLUX. FirstBlood members do not have such an opportunity.  Streaming monetization Live Streaming is one of the key features of FLUX. We offer a versatile system (both mobile and desktop) that will enable players profiting from winning competitive matches and tournaments, trading in-game objects, and conducting gameplay broadcasts.  Transparency and fairness FLUX is secure and easy to use. Smart contracts ensure fair and transparent transactions within the platform. Thanks to our recent partnership with MoxyOne, participants can now use credit or debit cards for transparent and convenient transactions.  One of a kind crowdfunding platform! Game developers can use FLUX crowdfunding platform to upload their games to the Developer Market and verify them. If a developer has raised funds to create their game using FLUX crowdfunding platform, part of the income is distributed among contributors as well.

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: The number of games-related projects launching their ICOs is really big now, but the main advantage of Flux over them is the conception and ideology of the project. There’s nothing like it in the market.

Author: hollybit
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: So what makes Flux so special?

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: The main aim of Flux is unification of the existing niches of gaming industry. The interface will be very convenient. All in all, this project will meet the needs of every industry’s participant.

Author: momo
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Okay, tell me pls, what wants of the gamers can be satisfied with the help of Flux which cant be satisfied anywhere else?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Gamers spend hours to improve their competitive skill and winning rate, collect rare artifacts, buy certain skins, improve their character but when they want to exchange one of these, they have to rely on centralized payment systems that most of external marketplaces provide. Meanwhile game developers earning are on average 30% reduced by popular markets and publishers.  We offer a system that will allow those players to get rewards for matchmaking competitions, trading items on the marketplace and even crowdfund their own idea inside of the platform. Contributors and developers will be provided a certain commission from each game as well.  With the help of blockchain technology, the whole process will become a lot more transparent and automated, which makes such platform a good extension for existing industry and helps to integrate cryptocurrency in real business.

Author: CryptoLuck07
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Hello! What processes in this industry will you be able to automate by using blockchain as the basis for your platform ?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Virtually every part of the platform will benefit from blockchain technology, and smart contracts specifically.  Paid matchmaking works due to the arbiter/escrow (Gaming Vendor, Gaming Source and auditable database) that will define the game outcome according to a smart contract.  Regarding crowdfunding, smart contracts are used to set it up. When game creators set the terms of their campaign, contributors can collectively withdraw from a contract during any stage if developers violate them.  Each and every commission is also taken automatically and saved in the blockchain.

Each league is characterized by access to special tournaments, and a reduced commission for each game. When a player reaches Win level 50 and his win rate is at least 15%, he is automatically moved up from a bronze to a silver league. Check out the details in our whitepaper on https://flux.fund!

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: All payments on the platform require FLUX tokens.  Quote from: bit679 on April 06, 2018, 01:51:33 PM How much will platform pay for completion of 1 daily task in average? We'd like to refrain from such estimates for now. For instance, in the game AirHockey with a $10 bet, Player_1 scores a winning point 1 second before the end of the game. In such scenario, he receives a reward of $3. The system in question should be quite comprehensive, elaborate and account for the differences in complexity and gameplay between various games. We'll be sure to announce something like that in detail once we're further into the development cycle.  Quote from: Shaurman on April 06, 2018, 01:58:56 PM How are u gonna fight against the cheaters in games? Responsibility for cheaters is held by the game vendors. That said, we will use specific applications to control the cheating software.

Body: And if the development is delayed for some insurmountable reason, can the developer agree with investors to postpone the deadline?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: It won't be possible. FLUX tokens are the only thing you can use to engage with the platform itself. It will be possible to use both fiat and cryptocurrency payments to add funds to your account, but all of the outcoming payments will only be made in FLUX tokens.  Quote from: SparkIt on April 05, 2018, 07:38:24 PM It is obvious that for the implementation of such a project in the first place it is important to have business relations with the teams of game developers.  On the site of Flux is a list of vendor partners. These are well-known companies such as Ubisoft, Gameloft and other eminent teams. Where can I find information on confirmation of cooperation? To be quite clear about the capacity in which we're linked to the companies mentioned. These are game development companies or distributors whose games we already use or will use on our platform. The way it's done is transparent and legal but doesn't necessarily involve direct cooperation.  Quote from: steelcityveteran on April 05, 2018, 07:47:57 PM And if the development is delayed for some insurmountable reason, can the developer agree with investors to postpone the deadline? While the developer can state a variety of terms, all of the cases of force majeure can't possibly be covered with a smart contract. Such negotiations are possible but nothing obligates the investors to comply if the reason wasn't stated in the pre-agreed terms.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: That is correct! Our platform will create and publish transparent smart contracts to allow game creators receive tokens from the contributors.  Contributors receive an opportunity to get paid a portion of matchmaking fee which is an additional stimulus. They also receive pre-order and VIP package from the game in question. Game creators set the terms, and if they violate them contributors can collectively withdraw from a smart contract during any stage.  Check out our whitepaper for details on https://flux.fund!

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: There are many gaming platforms and what are the benefits you are going to provide benefits? Whether did you make any partnership with the blockchain gaming platforms?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX is a complete ecosystem which will give everybody related to the gaming industry, players, traders, developers or streamers, an opportunity to earn.  For players, it is a matchmaking system. For developers, it is a monetization model with commission share from wagers. Currently we are negotiating on the implementation of our own streaming platform. However, we won’t limit player’s choice. You can use twitch, integrating the broadcast into FLUX. For traders, it is an autonomous trading ground where they can withdraw their digital goods. There is also a crowdfunding platform for gaming projects with benefits for both sides.  You can use any fiat and cryptocurrency to participate, and then use our token to withdraw. This way we create an ongoing demand for our token.  And about partnerships. Currently, we don't have any partnerships with such projects, but we are always looking forward to finding new partners! Also, you can read about the latter partnerships below. Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: It is not a secret that the number of gaming-related projects is rising, including those running a token sale - our team fully acknowledges this fact. However, we at FLUX distinguish ourselves from the other projects through the unique ideology and concept. Our goal is to create a versatile platform that unites all of the gaming niches (paid matchmaking, streaming, trading, developer market, crowdfunding etc.) using a practical and handy interface. FLUX should not be perceived as another narrowly focused venture that uses blockchain as its main feature. FLUX is an idea of universality realised with the means of technology to satisfy the needs of everyone related to the gaming industry.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: These are the commissions FLUX platform will charge: 1. FLUX Market is a marketplace for developers which is geared towards the monetization of competitive games. FLUX takes 0% commission for downloads or in-game purchases made via mobile applications for such types of games. 2. FLUX's matchmaking system usually takes a 1% to 7% commission on each bet placed by a gamer. It is distributed among FLUX to cover platform’s needs (10% of commission amount for SaaS, 15% for Marketing, 10% for Operations and Support, 10% for rewards and referral system payouts, 5% are saved as platform’s savings) and up to 50 % for Game Owner (Developer). 3. There is no commission for Virtual Goods (VG) VG to VG trading in FLUX. However, FLUX takes commission for VG buy/sell process between users in amount of 2%. 4. It will be possible to create skins in Steam workshop and by using a FLUX audience vote for accepting a certain skin. In case of acceptance, 20% of sales split between voters, 60% go to skin author, 20% go to FLUX.

This said, it will be possible to use both fiat and cryptocurrency payments to add funds to your account, but all of the outcoming payments will only be made in FLUX token.

Author: woodcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: From what else will the computer games suppliers get profit, except selling game copies on the Flux platform?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX helps developers to increase a demand for their game sand to make additional profits, as well as gives them an ability to distribute games without paying a commission. Every developer will have an ability to upload a game and receive commission from every matchmaking session. As soon as the game has been uploaded and verified by our system, it automatically appears in the list of available FLUX games. FLUX's matchmaking system usually takes a from 1% to 7% commission on each bet placed by a gamer. It is distributed among FLUX to cover platform’s needs (10% of commission amount for SaaS, 15% for Marketing, 10% for Operations and Support, 10% for rewards and referral system payouts, 5% are saved as platform’s savings) and up to 50 % for Game Owner (Developer).

Author: waitsummer

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: One player finds an opponent in a game, they place a bet, and the game starts. At the end of the game the winner will get all the money, and the loser will be left with nothing.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Flux allows every player to compete in games from a list of available games, and earn opponent’s money after a successful win.  In order to support secure and transparent matchmaking process, our system will use smart contracts. In this way, each game will consist of 2 players and its own arbiter/escrow (Gaming Vendor, Gaming Source and auditable database specifically) that will define the game outcome.  After a game was finished, one of two players will get the rewards in Flux tokens and the arbiter will get some fee for judgment. If arbiter (Game) fails to judge for some reason then both Player 1 or Player 2 can withdraw after some optional delay.  You can use BTC, ETH, LTC, EUR, or Visa/MasterCard payments etc. in order to top up your account but all of the game payouts using FLUX internal withdrawal method will be done in FLUX Token exclusively which will create an ongoing demand for our token and to unify our smart contracts and minimize risk of errors for their realization.  You can read more in our Whitepaper on the website! Link: https://flux.fund/en

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: For starters, paid matchmaking feature makes small scale competitions a thing that any player can organize. Of course, if we talk about tournaments, for now they'll be organized in a more centralised way. But the whole ecosystem is built to make each and every process automatic, transparent and fair. While players compete and earn in game using matchmaking platform and trade items related to that game on FLUX market place, or purchase items in FLUX store, the vendor (game creator) who has uploaded the game in question to the developer market earns a part of transaction and betting fee. Setting up this system to work like a clockwork is possible due to the use of blockchain technology.

I just don't know that, but I’ve become very interested. Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX is an entire ecosystem, which provides players with a matchmaking system, developers with market and monetization model, streamers with additional income, and establishes its own crowdfunding platform and trading marketplace. We are focused on gaming industry union, and we aim to let everyone earn!  1. DEVELOPER declares the idea of the GAME. 1.1 PLAYERS vote for the idea. 1.2 CONTRIBUTORS make contributions. 1.3 GAME soon becomes available.  2. PLAYER joins FLUX and buys the GAME. 2.1 DEVELOPER receives money for this. 2.2 CONTRIBUTORS of this game receive a share.  3. PLAYER 1 enters the game and plays, if he wins, he'll receive PLAYER'S 2 wager. 3.1 DEVELOPER receives comission share from the wager.  3. PLAYER 1 receives a game asset (in-game item) and decides to sell it to PLAYER 2. 3.1 DEVELOPER receives a comission share. 3.2 CONTRIBUTOR receives a comission share.  4 PLAYER 1 decides to make a custom skin or mod for the GAME. 4.1 PLAYERS vote for this skin. 4.2 PLAYERS buy this skin from PLAYER 1. 4.3 PLAYERS, WHO VOTED, receive a small share.  5. PLAYER 1 decides to stream the GAME. 5.1 PLAYERS donate to PLAYER 1 for the stream.

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: They believe that one of the main problems is the lack of liquidity in this global system. That is, gamers spend hours improving their skills, finding cool game objects, skins, etc., but when it comes to selling them, they have to rely on centralized payment systems that offer not the most favorable terms of exchange. And besides, the time of the exchange is very large.

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: We aim to create an ecosystem tying various aspects of the gaming industry. With FLUX, you can play competitively, earn from streaming, trade virtual goods on our marketplace or even crowdfund your game and monetize it, all on the same platform.  If you have any questions regarding specific features and how it all ties together, don't hesitate to ask!

Author: hollybit
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: No, what online store are you talking about?... It’s very simple! FLUX is an unique global gaming platform aimed to unite all parts of gaming industry ecosystem where players, developers, traders, and gaming community can transform their time and needs in money using gaming token FLUX COIN.

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Private keys will be held by users and stored on physical media. Moreover, a procedural generation method will be implemented to ensure security. At the moment we are considering several alternative solutions. However, we are not ready to announce them yet.

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Each user of the service is provided with unique token that acts as an identifier (nothing in common with ERC-20 token), it is the key and the identifier for all connected user accounts. In each game, whenever the user makes certain actions that are part of the matchmaking, their Game Vendor displays it in their account. We take the data from the account or the game vendor and write it to the blockchain for audit, and in certain cases (paid matchmaking) we transfer the data to a smart contract. This function counts all events, passes them to a third-party and internal handlers, and so on.

Author: lok5874
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: It seems to me that the level system has outdated since long ago, if it doesn’t give anything. Will the levels of the players have any impact in this case?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Various level and tier systems are still pretty prevalent in gaming industry when it comes to measuring the rating of the player. In case of our platform, the more wins a player has, the higher the level of his account (Win level). Upon reaching a certain level, the player can play in the big leagues. Each league is characterized by access to special tournaments, and a reduced commission for each game. When a player reaches Win level 50 and his win rate is at least 15%, he is automatically moved up from a bronze to a silver league.

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: The thing that makes FLUX stand out is that we present a complete ecosystem tied to every aspect of the gaming industry that works beneficially for everyone involved.  If you're a player, you can wager on matchmaking and earn with your gaming skills. You can also decide to be a streamer and reap the benefits of our rewards and donation system. As a game developer, you get comission from people competitively playing your game and trading items from it. If your game is still at the general idea stage, there's even a platform to crowdfund its development.  Each and every product, each and every participant get a way to benefit from FLUX. And nobody is limited to only one type of activity. It's a self sufficient system designed to fulfill the needs of many. That's what makes FLUX different.

Author: Sandy80ZhanG
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: What commissions will Flux charge from the income of the games developers?

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: There will be a 0% commission for uploading a game. FLUX Market is a marketplace for developers which is geared towards the monetization of competitive games. FLUX takes 0% commission for downloads or in-game purchases made via mobile applications for such types of games. As for the FLUX's matchmaking system, it usually takes a 1% to 7% commission on each bet placed by a gamer. It is distributed among FLUX to cover platform’s needs (10% of commission amount for SaaS, 15% for Marketing, 10% for Operations and Support, 10% for rewards and referral system payouts, 5% are saved as platform’s savings) and up to 50 % for Game Owner (Developer).

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: We at FLUX distinguish ourselves from the other projects through the unique ideology and concept. Our goal is to create a versatile platform that unites all of the gaming niches (paid matchmaking, streaming, trading, developer market, crowdfunding etc.) using a practical and handy interface. FLUX should not be perceived as another narrowly focused venture that uses blockchain as its main feature. FLUX is an idea of universality realised with the means of technology to satisfy the needs of everyone related to the gaming industry.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: The ammount of tokens player can win is unlimited! FLUX's matchmaking system usually takes a 1% to 7% commission on each bet placed by a gamer. It is distributed among FLUX to cover platform’s needs (10% of commission amount for SaaS, 15% for Marketing, 10% for Operations and Support, 10% for rewards and referral system payouts, 5% are saved as platform’s savings) and up to 50 % for Game Owner (Developer).

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: It is not a secret that the number of gaming-related projects is rising, including those running a token sale - our team fully acknowledges this fact. However, we at FLUX distinguish ourselves from the other projects through the unique ideology and concept. Our goal is to create a versatile platform that unites all of the gaming niches (paid matchmaking, streaming, trading, developer market, crowdfunding etc.) using a practical and handy interface. FLUX should not be perceived as another narrowly focused venture that uses blockchain as its main feature. FLUX is an idea of universality realised with the means of technology to satisfy the needs of everyone related to the gaming industry

Body: A followup on your question!  As a platform that strives to unite everybody related to the gaming industry, there's a lot of support planned for the developer market. The placement of games on the platform is going to be simple and free, since most of our income is planned to be made from comissions for matchmaking. So upselling and cross-selling models are a logical step for us.  While Steam is conducting this business in a centralized way, we aim to develop and provide a decentralized platform that allows everyone to participate throughout the whole value chain creation.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: One of the major problems is a lack of liquidity in the system. Gamers spend hours to improve their competitive skill and winning rate, collect rare artifacts, buy certain skins, improve their character but when they want to exchange one of these, they have to rely on centralized payment systems that most of external marketplaces provide. Meanwhile game developers earning are on average 30% reduced by popular markets and publishers. We offer a system that will allow those players to get rewards for matchmaking competitions, trading items on the marketplace and even crowdfund their own idea inside of the platform. Investors and developers will be provided a certain commission from each game as well. With the help of blockchain technology, the whole process will become a lot more transparent and automated, which makes such platform a good extension for existing industry and helps to integrate cryptocurrency in real business. Flux’s vision is to cover global market in the gaming space and to create a full ecosystem which will benefit all of its users and stakeholders. We are glad to invite everyone to become a part of a worldwide global business.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: Each user of the service is provided with unique token identifier (nothing in common with tokens erc20, it's just a term), it is the key and identifier for all connected user accounts. In each connected game, the user makes certain actions that are part of Matchmaking, their Game Vendor displays in their account. We take the data from the account or the game vendor and write to the blockchain for audit and transfer in certain cases (paid Matchmaking) to a smart contract. This function counts all events, passes them to third-party and internal handlers, and so on.

Author: bars_kz
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: The FLUX service will be developed on a microservice cloud-native platform using a nonrelational database. Thus, from a technical point of view, the service is as autonomous as possible and infinitely scalable. The main part of service – core – consists of microservices (web, desktop and mobile API are main in this list). We have specially designed each of these parts as a microservices as a service will be growing fast in different directions, and we need to make the work with this services to be organized comfortable and make them as autonomous as they could be.

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX: The Solidification of Game Streaming and Trading Becoming a Reality https://bitcoingarden.org/flux-the-solidification-of-game-streaming-and-trading-becoming-a-reality/  From gaming consoles to mobile games on Android and iOS devices and even online PC gaming, the number of gamers spread across every continent of the planet is a staggering 2.6 billion people. Whenever you have a gathering of such magnitude, you automatically have an economy in the making (whether it is efficiently run or not). The gaming industry is a mammoth both in size of its population and the number of products it produces. The gaming world has its fair share of challenging and one startup that has been making waves and is potentially going to change the gaming industry forever is the FLUX platform.  The Gaming world as of the present is a semi-rowdy industry with various parts working in disjointed symphony with others. Gamers grapple with multiple registrations n various platforms, with tokens and other in-game goodies being secluded to operating in their respective domains. The FLUX platform is one the like of which has never been seen before. This new revolution that is about to hit the gaming industry especially focuses on delivering timely and effective solutions for two very key areas in the industry; Game Streaming, and Trading....

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX won't save any personal user information. The system will have an universal ID of the user, and all the personal info will be held by the game vendor. We will access some of information via API - this is games history which is usually available for everyone. Private keys will be held by users themselves and each account will have a mandatory 2FA.

Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM

While it seems impossible for all of the projects to survive or become successful, there is clearly a possible outcome of some platforms coexisting. As for our way of reaching success - it's the desire to unite every gaming aspect at one place and let everyone connected to the gaming industry earn!

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: That's the main idea!  FLUX is a complete ecosystem which will give everybody related to the gaming industry, players, traders, developers or streamers, an opportunity to earn.  For players, it is a matchmaking system. For developers, it is a monetization model with commission share from wagers. For streamers, it is an additional donation/rewards system. For traders, it is an autonomous trading ground where they can withdraw their digital goods. There is also a crowdfunding platform for gaming projects with benefits for both sides.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: 1. DEVELOPER declares the idea of the GAME. 1.1 PLAYERS vote for the idea. 1.2 CONTRIBUTORS make contributions. 1.3 GAME soon becomes available.  2. PLAYER joins FLUX and buys the GAME. 2.1 DEVELOPER receives money for this. 2.2 CONTRIBUTORS of this game receive a share.  3. PLAYER 1 enters the game and plays, if he wins, he'll receive PLAYER'S 2 wager. 3.1 DEVELOPER receives comission share from the wager.  3. PLAYER 1 receives a game asset (in-game item) and decides to sell it to PLAYER 2. 3.1 DEVELOPER receives a comission share. 3.2 CONTRIBUTOR receives a comission share.  4 PLAYER 1 decides to make a custom skin or mod for the GAME. 4.1 PLAYERS vote for this skin. 4.2 PLAYERS buy this skin from PLAYER 1. 4.3 PLAYERS, WHO VOTED, receive a small share.  5. PLAYER 1 decides to stream the GAME. 5.1 PLAYERS donate to PLAYER 1 for the stream.  Moreover, a carefully designed system of achievements and tasks for each game allows the user to receive additional income by performing a variety of tasks during the game.  Furthermore, the more wins a player has, the higher the level of his account is. Upon reaching a certain level, the player can play in the big leagues. Each league is characterized by access to special tournaments, and a reduced commission for each game.  And the last but not the least, FLUX presents a referral system, where players can invite others to join the service and receive a percentage from all of their gaming sessions.  You can read more in our whitepaper on the website: https://flux.fund  P.S: We hope this also answers your question, Robinzzon.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: We are negotiating on the implementation of our own streaming platform. However, we won’t limit player’s choice. You can use twitch, integrating the broadcast into FLUX.

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: 1. FLUX Market is a marketplace for developers which is geared towards the monetization of competitive games. FLUX takes 0% commission for downloads or in-game purchases made via mobile applications for such types of games. 2. FLUX's matchmaking system usually takes a from 1% to 7% commission on each bet placed by a gamer. It is distributed among FLUX to cover platform’s needs (10% of commission amount for SaaS, 15% for Marketing, 10% for Operations and Support, 10% for rewards and referral system payouts, 5% are saved as platform’s savings) and up to 50 % for Game Owner (Developer). 3. There is no commission for Virtual Goods (VG) VG to VG trading in FLUX. However, FLUX takes commission for VG buy/sell process between users in amount of 2%. 4. It will be possible to create skins in Steam workshop and by using a FLUX audience vote for accepting a certain skin. In case of acceptance, 20% of sales spit between voters, 60% go to skin author, 20% go to FLUX.  Hope this answers your question as well, MadduckUK.

Author: kingntking
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: .WHITEPAPER.   .WEBSITE.   .BLOG.   .TWITTER.   .FACEBOOK.   .TELEGRAM.  SIGN UP FOR UPDATES ABOUT CROWDSALE!!   PUBLIC SALE BEGINS 17th APRIL  .VIDEO presentation. | .PDF presentation.   The gaming industry is booming right now and cryptocurrencies are exploding in popularity and value. The growth of ESports is really incredible. A long time ago this industry had become enormous and evolved into something bigger than just entertainment - now it is a real business , which  increases every year, attracting more and more money and gaining a broader audience.   But as gamers we have to go deeper, and after that we will see that, like all others, this business unfortunately has a lot of problems for every party. However, it is also: -Monopolized -Untrusted -Unorganized That is why we would like to introduce FLUX.GAMES to you — a unique global gaming platform that unites all parts of the gaming industry ecosystem where players, developers, traders, and the gaming community can transform their time and needs into money using our gaming FLUX COIN.     Features of the service:   Matchmaking Platform  Players can compete in top games for both PC and Mobile platforms and earn the opponent’s prize money after winning. Usage of BTC, ETH, LTC, USD, EUR is allowed.   Developer Market  0% commissions for competitive games. Upload your game app and it will become available for matchmaking. Receive a percentage for every matchmaking session.   Online Tournaments  Participate in FLUX tournaments or create your own tournaments for different games.   Community Rewards  Broadcast FLUX games and receive rewards, also additional donations from users in FLUX COINS. Sharing news on social networks is also rewarded.   Trading Platform  Trade items that are available in the FLUX store for FLUX COINS. Smart contracts guarantee a fair and transparent process.   Crowdfunding platform  Describe your project and crowdfund it with FLUX COINS. Investors receive part of the matchmaking rake fee from the game and pre-orders.   Achievements and Quests  Complete interesting in-game challenges and receive rewards in FLUX COINS.   Loyalty Program  Move to higher leagues and lower platform rake fees, unlock different rewards and exclusive tournament tickets.     MVP:  We are trying to do our best, so we already have an MVP. We are going to surprise you with our interesting and the most global bounty campaign ever    ECONOMY:       Roadmap    Our Team  And certainly we are confident in the success of FLUX due to having an incredible team, compiled of esports participants, game analysts, experienced blockchain developers, business developers and marketing team and of course we are proud to have remarkable partners

Author: FLUX-project
Title: [ANN][ICO] FLUX - DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL GAMING ECOSYSTEM
Body: FLUX coin is required to use all of the FLUX functional elements. This said, it will be possible to use both fiat and cryptocurrency payments to add funds to your account, but all of the outcoming payments will only be made in FLUX coins. This way we can ensure FLUX liquidity, which will benefit tokenholders the most!
